body.p: Views are available on the Summary tab of the patient record. There are three types of view: Folder, Composition or Report.
Views are created by query to the longitudinal record of events for the patient.

stentry.p: Unique identifier for the ISO-13606 View.
Label used when selecting the View
Description displayed when the user hovers over the View selection
Defines the sort order for the list of Views shown for selection. The highest rank appears at the top of the list. Rank of 0 means it is not displayed for selection

li.p: Folder - the view retrieves all the Composition(s) listed in the Content
Composition - the view retrieves the Data value for every Element in the Composition listed in the Content
Report - the view generates a report by filling out the InitialValue (usually the calculated Default value) of each Element in the Composition listed in the Content

stentry.p: Set of Compositions for the View, selected from a drop-down menu.
